# Netscape HTTP Cookie File
# This file was generated by yt-dlp. DO NOT edit this file manually.
# If you need cookies for private accounts, export them from your browser
# using a browser extension like "Get cookies.txt LOCALLY"
# 
# Instructions:
# 1. Install browser extension: "Get cookies.txt LOCALLY"
# 2. Visit Instagram/Twitter/TikTok and login
# 3. Click extension icon and export cookies
# 4. Replace this file with your exported cookies.txt
# 5. Rebuild Docker image: docker compose build
# 6. Restart bot: docker compose up -d
#
# For detailed instructions, see: CONFIGURAR_COOKIES.md
